condition.narrative: MCTD and the Participating Water Utility Entities, will be responsible for carrying out Part 1 of the Project
MTCD shall maintain the PIU w/ TOR and resources with competent staff, all satisfactory to the Association and the PIU shall beabolished and absorbed into MCTD by 6/30/2011
MTCD shall maintain the PIU w/ TOR and resources with competent staff, all satisfactory to the Association and the PIU shall beabolished and absorbed into MCTD by 6/30/2011
the Project Implementation Unit staff shall train MCTD staff in order that MCTD staff become competent to manage and superviseimplementation of the Project
